artist: Engraver: Claude du Bosc; Painter: After François Le Moyne
description: Perseus at top with sword and shield and winged feet; Andromeda chained to rock at right; sea dragon below left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Fra\'s Le Moyne Pinxit.  Cla\'d Du Bosc sculp./ PERSEUS & ANDROMEDA/ To Henry Fox Esq\'r. this Plate is humbly Dedicated/ by his Obliged(?) & Obedient Servant  B. Dickinson]; there is a coat of arms in center of inscription; in pencil on sheet: [1-161]
title: Perseus & Andromeda
